MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 16-JAN-2021 00:30.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the KY2 postcode ara of Kirkcaldy, affecting properties in Barassie Drive and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5:14pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further investigation work to trace the underground cable fault causing the power interruption we now expect to have power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:30am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:18PM on 15th January 2021.
